channel.title: dvorak on Mariel's GitHub page

item.title: Dvorak what?
item.description: It’s been quite sometime that I have been fiddling with the idea of learning Dvorak. When I learned typewriting and touch typing in school, QWERTY was the only one in use. This month I have started learning Dvorak and I’m looking forward to destroy/enhance my muscle memory.
